  • Method Details

    • choose

      void choose(com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle file)
      called when a single file was chosen

    • choose

      void choose(com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle> files)
      Called when multiple files were chosen. The Array given into the method will be returned to the pool after the call, so make a copy if you need one.
      See Also:

      Called when choosing one or more files was cancelled
